content: Great progress on the Austin location deployment! The team has completed the camera installations faster than expected.
Thanks John! We're pleased with the timeline. Quick question - when can we expect the analytics dashboard to be live?
The analytics dashboard should be ready by end of this week. We're finalizing the custom reports you requested.
I've uploaded the network documentation to the assets section. Please review and let me know if you need any clarifications.
Reviewed the network docs. Looks comprehensive. One concern - the bandwidth allocation for location 2 might be tight during peak hours.
Can we schedule a demo call for the franchise owners next week? They're eager to see the system in action.
I have availability on Tuesday or Thursday afternoons. Let me know what works for everyone.
Acme Corp deployment is looking solid! All 28 cameras are operational across the three San Francisco locations.
The retail analytics features are performing really well. Customer heatmaps are providing valuable insights for store layout optimization.
John Smith from Acme mentioned they want to expand to 5 more locations next quarter. Should we start preliminary planning?
Absolutely! I'll prepare a proposal with pricing and timeline estimates. This is exciting growth!
Quick heads up - Acme's IT team flagged a minor issue with API authentication. Already working on a fix, should be resolved today.
Thanks for the quick turnaround on that API issue. Acme confirmed everything is working smoothly now.
TechStart is ready to kick off! Emily Rodriguez seems very enthusiastic about the smart office features.
I've been coordinating with their facilities team. They want to integrate with their existing access control system. Is that feasible?
Yes, we can integrate with most standard access control systems. I'll need details on what system they're using.
They're using Verkada for access control. I'll get you the API documentation.
Perfect! Verkada integration is straightforward. Should have a timeline for them by end of week.
Emily mentioned they might want to add 4 more cameras to cover the rooftop terrace area. Should we include this in the current scope?
Altitude Trampoline Park project is off to a great start! Safety monitoring is the top priority here.
The 22 cameras are strategically placed to cover all trampoline zones. Sarah Johnson (owner) is very impressed with the coverage.
Great job on the camera placement! The incident detection AI is working perfectly. Already caught a few near-misses that staff could address immediately.
Question: Can we add a feature to track peak usage times? The owner wants to optimize staffing based on customer flow.
Definitely doable! We can enable occupancy analytics and generate heat maps. I'll add this to the next sprint.
The owner mentioned they're planning to open two more locations next year. They want to replicate this exact setup!
That's fantastic news! Let's document this deployment as a template for future locations. Great upsell opportunity!
